name: Atelier Tannis Prototype
description:
This is a prototype but I can no longer use RPG Maker so its indefinitely scrapped. A prequel to Marnie, I was attempting to use the system like Atelier Marie.

I always wanted to make an atelier fangame but I guess it was never in the cards to begin with. none the less, this is my final effort. -bunnybomb 05/11/2021
